title: Photography 'like meditation' after muscular dystrophy diagnosis
content: This video can not be playedJack Moyse was a teenager when he was diagnosed with muscular dystrophy.He admits his struggle to come to terms and talk about the diagnosis left him in a "dark place".That was until a friend suggested using his photography skills to help process the thoughts there were "haunting" him.Now he hopes his work can inspire others and raise awareness of the condition.
